metadata.dc:title: Hellsing vol. 1
metadata.dc:creator: Hirano, Kohta, 1973-
metadata.dc:subject: Horror
Vampire films
metadata.dc:description: Japanese manga translated into English about a covert government agency in England named after Abraham Van Helsing, which carries on his mission to protect queen and country from vampires and ghouls. Right to left reading format. "For readers 13+, violence, mild language"—from back cover.
metadata.dc:publisher: Dark Horse Manga, a division of Dark Horse Comics
metadata.dc:identifier: Fake University, Special Collections Research Center
